sentence: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker speaks at a rally featuring former President Donald Trump on Sept. 25, 2021, in Perry, Ga. | Sean Rayford/Getty Images By Natalie Allison 04/01/2022 04:31 AM EDT Herschel Walker, the former football star whos armed with former President Donald Trumps enthusiastic endorsement, has been on a glide path to the GOP nomination since announcing his Senate bid in Georgia.
title: The baggage is too heavy: GOP foes tee up last-ditch effort to sink Herschel Walker

sentence: No one, and I mean not one person, would seriously believe that Herschel Walker, the former football star and current leading contender for the Republican Senate nomination in Georgia, was at the top of his class at the University of Georgia.
title: Herschel Walker, the Worst Candidate, Trump-Approved
